column4: hello,i installed dual boot with windows.copy of my partitions setup http://pastebin.com/6bq0beDi  ,but now i have 4 primary partitions,wich make the rest of memory unusable.question..what should i do ,to have more  partitions?can i make the linux partition logical in order to do it?will i have to reinstall ?
add a extended partation table you can have 4 more partations
in gparted in add just slect extended
no slect add partation in the list you will see extended
that lets you add 4 more partations
the max any hdd can do is 8 partation 4 then extended and 4 more
prmary or local makes no deffence
ill say it again add a extended then you can make 4 more but thats the max any hdd can do
add a extended partation its in the list of partations
you cant have more then 4partatiosn thats why it says that
thers always a few megs you cant use there resvered for bad sectors
yes in gparted slect unusable right click slect add and extended
it will not effect the ones you have
i asume you can use that space now :)
once you add extended you shuld be able to make 4 more partations
but 8 is the max as i said no drive can make more then 8
